seller_description: Brand Aquasonic Age Range (Description) Adult Special Feature Waterproof, Ergonomic, Lightweight, Travel Size, Brushing Timer Power Source Battery Powered Item Firmness Description Soft. About this item: 40,000 VPM Smart Toothbrush Beauty, brains and power. The Black Series is a world class modern electric toothbrush packed with the most up to date technology. It features an ultra-powerful and industry leading motor producing 40,000 vibrations per minute, a lithium-ion battery, ultra-fast wireless charging, 4 mode operation, smart vibration timers, 8 DuPont engineered brush heads, and a custom travel case; all with a sleek ultra-slim, lightweight and IPX7 rated waterproof design. Accepted by the American Dental Association (ADA) Council on Scientific Affairs We put our money where your mouth is. Investing in premium oral care technologies has earned the Black Series the prestigious ADA seal of approval. It has shown efficacy in removing plaque and helping to prevent and reduce gingivitis. Black Series goes beyond just cleaning teeth it provides complete oral care with unique modes that include one for whitening and polishing teeth, and one for improving gum health. Modern Tech for a Healthy Smile - Black Series brings toothbrushes into modern times with its built-in enhanced features. A lithium-ion battery, ultra-fast wireless charging (forget outdated USB charging), 4 distinct brushing modes and a smart vibrating notification timer are some of the enhanced features built into the sleek and ergonomic waterproof black satin handle. 8 DuPont Brush Heads   Travel Case Included Included are 8 brush heads engineered by world famous DuPont; a world leader in quality   materials science. Each brush head lasts 3-4 months so 8 will last for about 2.5 years. Also included is a convenient custom hard shell travel case made of BPA-free plastic with space for two brush heads. Black Series can last 4 full weeks (2 min/2x a day) on a full charge so it's perfect for on the go travel with the included travel case. What's in the Box - 1 AquaSonic Black Series Smart Toothbrush, 1 wireless charging base, 8 DuPont brush heads, 1 travel case, warranty card, and user manual.
review: I have been using an Oral B/Braun brush for years, but one of the two I have decided to quit, so I thought I would try a 'sonic' toothbrush. Going from a brush that moves to one that essentially just vibrates is a little strange. It took a little effort to determine the best way to use the brush, but my first impression is that I like it. If a toothbrush can look 'cool' - this one would qualify. The handle is pretty sleek and has a nice pattern on the back side that helps with getting it in the right position by feel. The travel case is nice enough, I assume they figure you won't be gone long enough to have to charge it, since there is no place to put the charging base. The four modes really are different, I think I like the cleaning and whitening modes best. It would have been nice if they had included a UV sanitizer in the travel case instead of space for two brush heads, but I already have a sanitizer for home and travel. Since the brush does not have openings, cleaning is pretty much just rinsing like a regular toothbrush. If first impressions hold, I think I may want to get another one of these brushes to have a full travel set.
expected-output: The seller's images and description for the AquaSonic Black Series toothbrush project a high-tech, premium product with multiple advanced features designed for efficient and effective oral hygiene. The sleek black design, IPX7 waterproof rating, four brushing modes, 40,000 vibrations per minute motor, and smart timer align with a modern user experience. Additionally, the product emphasizes convenience with an ergonomic, travel-friendly case and extended battery life. It also includes eight DuPont brush heads, which should last a long time, supporting the claim of value. The buyer’s review highlights a mostly positive experience with the product, although there is an adjustment period transitioning from a different type of toothbrush (Oral B/Braun). The buyer appreciates the aesthetic appeal of the AquaSonic toothbrush, describing it as “cool” and noting the sleek handle design. They also commend the performance of the four modes, especially the cleaning and whitening ones, suggesting satisfaction with the brushing effectiveness. However, the buyer points out a potential design oversight regarding the travel case. While the case is designed with space for additional brush heads, it lacks storage for the charging base, which could be inconvenient for extended trips where charging might be necessary. The buyer also expresses a preference for a UV sanitizer in the case, indicating a desire for enhanced hygiene options, though this is not presented as a significant flaw. Conclusion: The seller’s description and images align well with the buyer’s overall experience, indicating that the product largely delivers on its promises. The buyer appears to be satisfied with the product's aesthetic appeal, functionality, and versatility across different brushing modes. Minor suggestions related to the travel case design (charging base storage and UV sanitizer) represent user preferences rather than deficiencies in product performance. Therefore, the review conveys a positive impression, with only minor improvements suggested for optimal convenience during travel. The seller accurately described the AquaSonic Black Series toothbrush's features, and the buyer's experience aligns well with these promises, particularly in terms of aesthetics, functionality, and effectiveness across brushing modes. The buyer's minor suggestions about the travel case (adding space for the charging base and a UV sanitizer) are preferences rather than flaws in the product itself, indicating a generally positive experience.
